column5: Well....just booked the annual ice fishing trip with seven friends from work.  This year we are heading back to Sandy Bay Cottages on Callendar bay Feb. 11, 12, 13/08.  This is a Monday-Wednesday trip this year.  I find it much more relaxing and more productive mid-week than trying to fish with the masses on the weekends.  If anybody else happens to be heading up to the area at the same time, I would love to meet with you and maybe share a few lies over a cold Sasparilla.  I know lots here still have plenty of softwater action planned, but when your planing a trip for eight people you have to look far enough ahead.  Cheers to all and good luck to all the folks heading to Quinte over the next few weeks.  be safe  Craig

Well, I suppose it's a good betthe ice will be sufficient then.  What with the above normal temps, it would be a difficult guess when the ice will be thick enough.  Not sure if it will be by Jan 1, 2008 when the ice season opens.
I'll try to lay hookey and meet up with youzz ... are ya stayin' in a Ice Bungalow?
Randy....Were staying onshore and will be on the ice all throuhout the day.  Craig
Sandy Bay is a great place, caught a lot of fish there through the ice. Im heading to Anglers haven mid february, I cant wait! Bring on the ice!
